snippet: A Roman Catholic church official could soon seek bail after a Pennsylvania appeals court refused to review a decision to throw out his child-endangerment conviction.
lead_paragraph: A Roman Catholic church official could soon seek bail after a Pennsylvania appeals court refused to review a decision to throw out his child-endangerment conviction.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Jailed Church Official May Seek Bail
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Jailed Church Official May Seek Bail
